availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of Adams and Mildred Montgomery. Married Mary F. Kitson Montgomery. Father of Mary E. Montgomery, George F. Montgomery, Mildred Ann Montgomery, Clark S. Montgomery, Sarah F. Montgomery, Martha L. Montgomery, and Lydia B. Montgomery.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1, p 390A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, pp. 377-378.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Shelby County, District 2, p. 424A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994038, Henry County Births.
